website_summaries.verdict: At $150, this alarm clock doesn't feel like a smart buy for your bedside.
pros: The iHome iAVS16 is a functional clock with a USB charging port and near-full Alexa functionality, including music playback, traffic and weather, and -- of course -- alarms
It can also wake you up by playing a Spotify playlist, which Amazon's Echo devices still can't do
cons: The build is bulky and cluttered with a clunky-looking display and an over-abundance of buttons
It doesn't support Alexa's ESP or calling and messaging features, and it doesn't currently support voice-activated Spotify playback

customer_reviews.title: Will only work in the United States!
customer_reviews.text: "Universal 100-240V AC adaptor. Switching power supply works just about anywhere in the world to power your unit...!" YEA; ok- that's fine, but what they DONT tell you is that you CAN NOT adjust the clock if youre traveling "just about anywhere in the world". It automatically sets to one of the five U.S. timezones (Eastern, Central, Mountain, Pacific, Alaska or Hawaii). That's it! There's no option for any other timezones. So I'm overseas on a deployment and there's absolutely NO WAY to correctly set the time. I imagine it will be nice when I get back to the U.S. (in a year!). However, I'm really hoping they get their shyt together and patch a firmware update. It's outrageous!
customer_reviews.author: Rockback33

customer_reviews.title: Meh. :-(
customer_reviews.text: This device replaced an Echo Dot and a clock radio. If I had the opportunity to make the choice again, I would keep the Echo Dot, add Bluetooth speakers, and just get a simple clock. This device is not as functional as an Echo device. Some Alexa plug-ins go 'mute' when accessed through this device (meaning they do not speak through this device - as they do through a real Echo). This device also does not hear as well as a real Echo. You will find yourself speaking louder than usual and/or repeating yourself when addressing this device. At this price point, I would recommend you find an alternate solution. It looks exponentially better than it actually functions.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Not an alexa device, alexa built in as an afterthought
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as user friendly and capable as I was hoping for. Have to download additional app just to configure, alexa's capabilities are limited, alarm clock does not function as one would expect from a "radio style alarm clock" (I know it don't say its a radio alarm clock, but looking at the design its pretty easy to expect that it is) I have other alexa devices and I have to say I should have just bought a spot or a show, was rather disappointed with the capability and lack of user friendly features with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Not User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that I have to use two different apps to control an alarm clock. Every time I closed the iHome app, the WiFi disconnects and I would have to connect it every single time. The same with the Bluetooth. Disappointed because it has really good sound. In order for me to set an alarm, I either have to use Alexa by voice command or the Amazon Alexa app, which didn’t work. I live overseas so I couldn’t set the time on the iHome app to reflect the correct time. The Amazon Alexa app has the capability but doesn’t change on the clock. I’m returning it and will be looking for another nightstand alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: b33zY

customer_reviews.title: It's not exactly Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews have commented about the brightness at night, issues with volume, and other problems. My problem is that I bought it, expecting Alexa to work just as it does on an Echo or Echo Dot, and instead the device has a subset of functionality. Broadcasts, dropins, and calls aren't supported -- which is comic, since the device has a physical call button on the top! It does odd things when beginning to play music -- stutters, delays -- which my Echo Dots don't have. The microphone setup isn't as sensitive -- I sometimes have to say "Alexa" three or four times, loudly, before it notices. Taking it back...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Love this device!
customer_reviews.text: I love this device! It does everything I hoped and more. I saw people complain that it is too bright, but you can adjust the settings in the app to make it dim at night and brighten when you wake up. Maybe the old reviews which weren’t great were before the firmware update. The sound quality is good. You can listen to music using Alexa, through the iHome app which supports Spotify(and others) plus your personal music. It also has Bluetooth. I do wish you could make phone calls like with echo, but overall I’m extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality,  but Spotify won't work on alarm after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Product works, alexa works. Speakers are nice and loud. Bought it specifically so I could use Alexa and wake up to my spotify playlist. It will play spotify but will only use the factory alarm setting, even if you set the app up and link spotify. This is a VERY expensive alarm clock comparing it to others, so I shouldn't have issues 6 months in.
customer_reviews.author: matthew ostman

customer_reviews.title: keeps losing connection due to firmware
customer_reviews.text: this is the second week I've had to contact support due to losing wifi connection-they blame it on my modem (it's not the modem)...they did a recent update on firmware but my unit still read firmware up to date December 12, 2017! I asked for a refund and they said they said I would have to bring it to the store I purchased at 2 years ago!! I don't have the reciept because I thought this was a reliable company.......I will never purchase anything from iHome again! complete garabage and a waste of time and money ($150 to be exact)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient piece of technology. Needed an alarm clock with the time clearly visible and this is it. Alexa integration also let's me turn off/on the lights with my voice, as well as check the weather, traffic, and news. The speaker is satisfactory, it won't blow you away but it does sound better than any of the current echo products. Bluetooth is also an included feature, but I'd prefer getting an amazon music unlimited subscription that way you can just tell alexa to play any song or playlist you want.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I am an IT Professional and this is the only piece of equipment that I have ever wanted to throw across the room. When I first purchased it, it worked great. After loosing power, it refuses to connect to WiFi and simply does not work! IHome customer service is terrible! There is absolutely nothing I can do with this product. A big waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia A. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: but the self setting clock is easy to read
customer_reviews.text: The unit is kinda big for a nightstand, but the self setting clock is easy to read. The function buttons are on top and illuminated. Even at the lowest display setting, it still fills the room with a bluish hue; not bad enough to deter sleep, however. I rated it a 3 because Alexa can be hard of hearing if you don't speak directly at her. I returned it and replaced it with the iAVS1 and an Echo Dot. Perfect for the bedroom and about $50. less.
customer_reviews.author: BlownItem

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sensitive if you have other Alexa
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really awesome and easy to use. Only complaint is that every time we talk to our other Amazon Alexa products, this alarm clock is so sensitive, it interacts thru the walls and we have to constantly tell it to go to bed. It picks up our tv saying Alexa in commercials (thorough the walls).
customer_reviews.author: campbell834

customer_reviews.title: Screwy Snooze
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for almost a year but now something has gone awry with the snooze function. It used to go off every 9 minutes like every other clock I’ve had, but now it goes off again, first a few seconds later, then a minute later, then a varying number from 4 to 7 minutes later. I can’t figure out how to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail S. Collier

customer_reviews.title: N
customer_reviews.text: The product is a desaster! I dont recomend it! The conection is awfull. And the help from i Home Word y
customer_reviews.author: Diungano

customer_reviews.title: Was excited, now dashed!
customer_reviews.text: What a great concept. Bought a IAVS16. Should have sent it back! Two major issues.....very hard to get the night dimming level where I want it via the app. Too Dark or too light. They need a better way! Now the HUGE ISSUE! I have to Yell at it to get it to awake the Alexa App. Just to turn on the lamp, I have to yell at it multiple times! Call support, no suggestions. Rather told that this unit will probably be discontinued!!! What a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Perry

customer_reviews.title: Although it has Alexa built in, it does not play music "everywhere" with the rest of Alexa devices.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty clever clock radio.. We love the fact you can set several alarms as well as a timed brightness control for the display. As far as music, we have not listened to music on it due to the fact it does not play music everywhere with our Alexa Dots & Alexa Echo. I tried to call iHome tech support only to get a busy signal.... Why state it has an Alexa in it if it doesn't do all the things an Alexa can do ?!
customer_reviews.author: Beachndude

customer_reviews.title: Hiccups
customer_reviews.text: Works but with hiccups: by mistake, better said. It surrendered. The light on the bottom become lime and cannot be changed. The next version will be available soon, it was already at CES2018, I hope it will not be so buggy.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin Chiriac

customer_reviews.title: Warning - DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this zero stars if I could. I bought two of these and both won’t connect and stayed connected to my WiFi making it useless. I have 35 other devices on my wireless Lan working flawlessly and these won’t connect. I contacted iHome technical support but they wouldn’t do anything nor would they refund me.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife for a simple clock with alexa capabilities to play music. Alexa won't respond to voice commands anymore, and without this, you cannot set the alarm. Way too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Continue to have issues and problems
customer_reviews.text: We have had to return one of these because it just would not work. now on this one we are still having issues with it working correctly. It has great potential but we keep having issues.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: I like voice command for setting alarms
customer_reviews.text: I like voice command for setting alarms. I do not like the fact that it picks up my and my wife's voice from another room. Will come on for no reason and play music. Bought a second one but will return it to store.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: My first Alexa Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this speaker for my massage room due to the Bluetooth connectivity. I love the Alexa feature also. I can just give her commands to turn on and off and play different stations from my Pandora which she links up with. Very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be Great.
customer_reviews.text: Pro Looks great, Sounds great, easy to set alarms with Alexa Con Can't stream SiriusXM (not all Alexa skills work), can't get the light bar to stay off, Temp on display is off by 4 or 5 degrees. Wish I could turn off the lights on the top buttons. Sure hope they fix the "Cons" with firmware updates.
customer_reviews.author: GC Buyer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Maybe i just got a deffected one but im not taking my chance again with this product. When i first got the device it worked perfect. The sounds was great and all the features worked perfectly. Then day two came and the sound went to crap. Its muffled and full of static. I will not recommend this product to friends or family. I do not recommend you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dillin Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Needs an update
customer_reviews.text: I really like the speaker but there needs to be a way to adjust the volume for Alexa voice and when pairing a Bluetooth signal. ITS WAY TOO FREAKING LOUD! All iHome needs to do is a software update (along with the app) and this could be an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Over priced. I have had nothing but problems from this. WiFi problems, Alexa problems, Bluetooth problems. Nice idea, piss poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! We love Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for Christmas ! Works great ! We love Alexa.He loves the big numbers on the clock..and how bright it is !
customer_reviews.author: Aprilsdiamond

customer_reviews.title: can't even use the dumb thing. My wife called amazon about and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Volume does not work properly, can't even use the dumb thing. My wife called amazon about and they told her tough luck. Would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jed Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: I really like this clock with Alexa features Getting used to a ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this clock with Alexa features Getting used to a few things but works great Extremely happy
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a year
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it broke within a year of purchasing it. It was a great clock while it lasted, and fairly easy to use. But it had more functionality than I really needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It has Alexa!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, sounds great, and has Alexa. I like it and it does what I expected it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for i heart radio
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to set up since we have another one in another bedroom, but once we saw the path it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Eig

customer_reviews.title: Just needed to update
customer_reviews.text: It just needs to update and it works just like the echo dot if not better
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Alpiger

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can change setting in brightness and turn ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can change setting in brightness and turn off colors. Hate it doesn’t come with any instructions on how to work it. There are Instructions in how to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: R DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Randomly turns on
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the person that I gave it to, says that Alexa will just turn on overnight and not do what she is told.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: After a year it stops connecting to the internet.
customer_reviews.text: After a year it stops connecting to the internet. No tech support out there to fix this issue. I even called iHome and I've had a device not working for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Benedict salindong

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound and the music sounds so nice and alarm clock is so great and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: kiko

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup & use
customer_reviews.text: I have it on my nightstand. I love it especially when I have to do cleaning in our bedroom and our bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Wasting your money for showing wrong time !
customer_reviews.text: Cant adjust the time zone if you live outside of US, no meaning any other functions.
customer_reviews.author: ashener

customer_reviews.title: Dumb
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is I couldn’t even set up the clock with out being connected to Alexa. Second biggest complaint is I could connect to WiFi at all. If I could have just set up the clock with out internet I would have kept this I loved the look and the dimmer settings. It was perfect but I’m returning it cause I don’t want to have to rely on an internet connection to use a simple feature. Do not buy this unless you have internet and even if you do I hope you get one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying starts talking out of nowhere
customer_reviews.text: Very annoying starts talking out of nowhere, can't get the alarm clock to wake with music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this product and spent four hours trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this product and spent four hours trying to get it to connect to the Internet. Called iHome customer support and after being disconnected three times finally got a person who told me that department was gone for the weekend and to call back on Monday. I’m sending back this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love alexa screaming at you.
customer_reviews.text: Will be sending this back. He device is great in form but function is lacking. Cannot use amazing alexa calling and messaging. Also it raises its volume to the highest level on alarms and doesn’t go back so alexa responds at the top of her lungs.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: its a smart device and it cant connect to the wifi itself
customer_reviews.text: would not recommend. not sure why you need to install an app on your phone to connect the alarm clock to wifi, seems kind of pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Antoni Balbus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Alexa is slower than a normal Alexa device is.
customer_reviews.author: aaron kliss

customer_reviews.title: Please provide South Africa time zone like the amazon echo dot does and I will give ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not support South Africa time zone. My date and time is out of sync. Please provide South Africa time zone like the amazon echo dot does and I will give u 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybabe

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor support service
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor support service, Had a problem with wifi connection after a week of usage. Contacting support very very poor. Never responded to my inquiry. Would not recommend it as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Marino Battigelli

customer_reviews.title: Love having Alexa & an old school alarm clock together!
customer_reviews.text: I completely love this product! Having Alexa attached, having something that looks nice on the bedside, being able to charge my cell phone/iPad, listening to music or apps before going to bed. All great things! Only downside was cost, but I'm ok with that after enjoying it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: No Support, unreliable tech
customer_reviews.text: Very inventive design, horrible stability and no customer support. All support is do it yourself. The ihome plugs are unstable too. They lose their network connection so don't put them behind heavy furniture because you may have to access them frequently to reset them. I am very disappointed in ihome because their devices won't stay connected to the network and after you have tried all you know to do, have gone through the app, watched the videos, read the docs, etc. you still cannot get help from ihome except the self-help. If you are going to be in the technology business, you need to support the products and customers. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ivey R.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this not even a year ago. I love the concept but there is a major flaw in the design. The Lights on the bottom worked great for about 6 months, but then something happened. The light went to lime green and would not turn off or change. I called for technical support several times and was placed on hold for an extended period of time. I was basically walked through the steps to reset it, but that did not fix the problem. I finally unplugged it and called again. They said that the would send an email which I have not received yet. I would not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my girlfriend. It was an instant hit. We plugged it in, and myself, her, and her parents just took turns talking to alexa. It is an expensive alarm clock, but I think its neat. We all had a great time with it. The volume gets plenty loud, and the music clarity is also good. Oh, and its an alarm clock. So it does what its suppose to do as well. The weather displayed is very convenient. All around would recommend again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew I.

customer_reviews.title: up dated version
customer_reviews.text: easy to dim numbers with push of snooze button. alexa works great. bottom ' lights have a dedicated button so easy to use. Read all the reviews so tried to cancel the order but was too late. Glad it is up dated and most if not all of the flaws have been fixed through firmware. At 122,it a pretty good deal
customer_reviews.author: Joel C

customer_reviews.title: iHome iAVS16 Bedside Speaker Alexa Built in, Bluetooth USB Charging, Now Supports Spotify Voice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over a year now and I have a love-hate relationship with it. I typically will set things on top of it since it has a flat surface, and the buttons up top are easily activated, so the dimmer switch gets activated more often than I'd like it to. Alexa listens quite well. The sound quality is pretty good for something so small. The lights along the bottom are characteristic.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: No Pandora app
customer_reviews.text: I love asking Alexa questions, I would sit all day asking a bunch of stuff. Super convent when setting up alarm or asking how's the weather. But sometimes Alexa randomly turns on for no reason, don't like how I cant use Pandora app.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: NOT as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it...took me numerous attempts to even connect to my wifi. And then once I did establish connection it was terrible... Don't waste your money or time on the product...
customer_reviews.author: MrPrice_isRight

customer_reviews.title: Wrong time, not able to connect to WiFi.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned one since it was introduced, it has never met expectations. The worst problem is it displays the incorrect time! I live in the Pacific time zone and it has always been an hour off, no matter what I do. Now with the latest firmware update, that I applied today, it no longer connects to my wifi network. It's headed for the bone pile.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Quigley

customer_reviews.title: but other than that I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: They should add night light as a feature. The buttons on top stay lit all the time and I have to adjust the display at bed time, but other than that I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jon H.

customer_reviews.title: Junk clock
customer_reviews.text: I have had this clock for over a year, it has never connected to wifi ~ several attemps! Way too much money for the malfunction! I use it to charge my ipad...would return if I could have. DO NOT BUY...
customer_reviews.author: nlgionet

customer_reviews.title: Bedside Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I saw some complaints about this device, but it was real easy for me to set-up and I like using it as an alarm clock. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Redmond jack

customer_reviews.title: This clock has more bugs with it than good. I was very excited about getting this but ...
customer_reviews.text: This clock has more bugs with it than good. I was very excited about getting this but I have had so many issues with that it's definitely not worth $130. I've contacted technical support about a few issues & it's been about 3 weeks & they haven't solved any of my issues yet. Spend you $$ on something else that actually works like it says it does. Otherwise this is just a really expensive clock w/ some pretty lights on it w/ Alexa that doesn't work like it's suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE and DARRELL STALLCUP

customer_reviews.title: Does not work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Disconnects from WiFi in the middle of the night and random times throughout the day; will not connect through modern router system. Emailed customer support two weeks ago and never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Carl L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Like that I can control the light. Love playing music. Like the way the alarm fades in.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Akin

customer_reviews.title: SO LOVE THIS! WORKS AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: SO LOVE THIS! WORKS AS DESCRIBED...MAKES MY DAYS EASIER TO LISTEN TO MUSIC AS I WORK AND EVEN TURN OFF ALEXA WHEN I DONT WANT IT ON. WOULD RECOMMEND HIGHLY.
customer_reviews.author: Smoky Mtn

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice product great display. A bit pricey. Not enough microphones. You literally have to tell for Alexa to hear you.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the iHome alarm clock with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, great sound, attractive design. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: charlene bell

product_meta.title: iHome iAVS16 Bedside Speaker with Alexa Built In, Bluetooth, and USB Charging, Now Supports Spotify by Voice
product_meta.description: The iAVS16 is an innovative bedside clock with Far Field Amazon Alexa Voice Service (AVS) to play music, audio books, and more. Control smart home devices, get weather, news, traffic c and more. Far Field Voice Activation for Alexa commands from anywhere in the room. Built-in mic, digital voice echo cancellation and answer/end controls make speakerphone use a pleasure. Popular streaming Wi-Fi audio from Spotify, Pandora, iHeart Radio, Amazon Music, Tune in and others. Supports Spotify Connect, including programmable presets for one-touch playback of any Spotify playlist or album. Supports Amazon Smart Home Skills, including iHome SmartPlugs (sold separately). Control hundreds of smart home devices from Nest, Wink, SmartThings and more. Innovative LED accent lighting with unique patterns for Alexa requests. Operates on included 100V-240V universal AC adapter. 2.1 Amp USB port to rapidly charge mobile devices (cable not included).
feature_bullets: Amazon alexa is built in the cloud, so it is always getting smarter. Just Ask alexa to play music, control your smart home, hear the news, check weather and more.

The iAVS16 also allows you to play your music and answer calls over the Bluetooth wireless Connection. Universal 100-240V AC adaptor. Switching power supply works just about anywhere in the world to power your unit
The iAVS16 is always getting smarter, Spotify voice control, Alexa Calling and messaging and ESP features are coming soon.
The iAVS16 works great with iHome smartplugs (sold separately), just Ask alexa via your iAVS16 to turn off your lights, turn on a fan, Start the coffee and much more, all from the comfort of our Bed.
The integrated light bar provides all the familiar alexa-based experience while also allowing for always-on mood lighting with adjustable modes and colors.
One-touch action buttons provide the quickest way to trigger a Series of events such as controlling your smartplugs and playing a Spotify music.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars205 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
